statements: SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_metadata;
SELECT study_name, participants_count FROM clinical_trials_metadata;
SELECT trial_id, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials_metadata WHERE status='active';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_metadata WHERE participants_count > 100;
SELECT study_name FROM clinical_trials_metadata ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_metadata WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT trial_id, study_name, participants_count FROM clinical_trials_metadata WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT study_name, participants_count FROM clinical_trials_metadata WHERE participants_count > 100 AND status = 'enrolling';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials_metadata WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY participants_count DESC;
SELECT trial_id, study_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials_metadata WHERE status IN ('active', 'completed') ORDER BY start_date ASC, participants_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT trial_name, sponsor, start_date, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE status='Ongoing';
SELECT trial_name, location FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE status='Completed';
SELECT trial_name, sponsor, start_date, end_date, location FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE sponsor='ABC Company';
SELECT trial_name, sponsor, location FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE start_date>'2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT trial_name, sponsor, status FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE location='California' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM ResearchStudies WHERE status = 'Published' AND location='New York' ORDER BY end_date;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date, end_date, status FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE sponsor='ABC Corp' ORDER BY trial_id;
SELECT researcher, status, end_date FROM ResearchStudies WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, location FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE status='Ongoing' AND sponsor='XYZ Labs';
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE study_type = 'Observational';
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, age, gender FROM TrialParticipants WHERE age > 30;
SELECT trial_id, COUNT(*) AS participant_count FROM TrialParticipants GROUP BY trial_id;
SELECT t.trial_name, tr.result_description FROM ClinicalTrials t JOIN StudyResults tr ON t.trial_id = tr.trial_id;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials LIMIT 5;
SELECT trial_name, study_type FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.trial_name, p.participant_name, p.age FROM ClinicalTrials t INNER JOIN TrialParticipants p ON t.trial_id = p.trial_id WHERE p.age >= 25;
SELECT t.trial_name, r.result_description FROM ClinicalTrials t LEFT JOIN StudyResults r ON t.trial_id = r.trial_id WHERE r.result_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT t.trial_name, COUNT(p.participant_id) AS num_participants FROM ClinicalTrials t INNER JOIN TrialParticipants p ON t.trial_id = p.trial_id GROUP BY t.trial_id HAVING num_participants > 10;
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials;
SELECT trial_name, study_type FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT site_name, location FROM trial_sites ORDER BY site_name DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, expertise FROM researchers WHERE expertise LIKE '%oncology%';
SELECT participant_name, age, condition FROM trial_participants WHERE age >= 30 AND condition='Diabetes';
SELECT * FROM clinical_trials WHERE study_type = 'Double-Blind';
SELECT trial_name, start_date, end_date FROM clinical_trials WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location, trial_name FROM trial_sites JOIN clinical_trials ON trial_sites.trial_id = clinical_trials.trial_id WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT participant_id, participant_name, age, condition, trial_name FROM trial_participants JOIN clinical_trials ON trial_participants.trial_id = clinical_trials.trial_id ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT researcher_name, expertise FROM researchers WHERE expertise LIKE '%Oncology%' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials;
SELECT trial_id, trial_name, start_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT study_name, study_description FROM ResearchStudies WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT researcher_name, specialty FROM Researchers WHERE institution_name = 'XYZ University';
SELECT * FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT trial_name, end_date FROM ClinicalTrials WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT study_name, researcher_name FROM ResearchStudies JOIN Researchers ON ResearchStudies.researcher_id = Researchers.researcher_id;
SELECT TrialResults.result_details, Patients.patient_name FROM TrialResults JOIN Patients ON TrialResults.patient_id = Patients.patient_id WHERE result_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
